labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Win 10 x64, latest Discord Canary build
data.actual_result: Only "Default" appears and cannot be changed.
data.expected_result: Being able to change output devices however you want.
data.short_description: Discord removing all audio output devices except default
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Windows audio settings - Select any other playback / recording device - Set it as default - (optional) Change it back to what it was before - Go to Discord Client Settings - Go to voice - Open Dropdown menu "Output Device"
